article: I found out that doing a favor for someone could get you into a lot of _ . I was in the eighth grade at the time, and we were having a final _ . During the test, the girl _ next to me whispered something, but I didn t understand. So I leaned over her way and found out that she was trying to ask me _ . I had an extra pen. She showed me that _ was out of ink and would not write. I happened to have an extra one, so I took it out of my pocket and put it on her desk.Later, after the test papers had been _ , the teacher asked me to _ in the room when all the other students were _ . As soon as we were alone, she began to talk to me about _ it meant to grow up; she mentioned how important it was to stand _ your own two feet and be responsible for your own acts. For a long time, she talked about honesty and emphasized the fact _ people do something dishonest, they are really _ themselves. She made me promise that I would think _ about all the things she had said, and then she told me I could _ , I walked out of the room wondering _ she had chosen to talk to me about all those things.Later on, I found out that she thought I had cheated in the test. When she saw me lean over to talk to the girl next to me, it looked _ I was copying answers _ the girl s test paper. I tried to explain about the pen, but all she could say was that it seemed very strange to her that I hadn t _ anything about the pen the day she talked to me right after the test. _ I tried to explain that I was just doing the girl a favor _ letting her use my pen, I am sure she continued to believe that I had cheated in the test.
